snippet: ZARUCKI--Rose. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of our devoted long-time member, Rose Zarucki, beloved wife of the late Charles Zarucki, mother of Betsy Zarucki and Judith Zarucki, grandmother and great- grandmother. Heartfelt sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZARUCKI--Rose. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of our devoted long-time member, Rose Zarucki, beloved wife of the late Charles Zarucki, mother of Betsy Zarucki and Judith Zarucki, grandmother and great- grandmother. Heartfelt sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3
